author: Aidan Alexander
comment: Great watch face. Really love how simple the design is and the use of colour. I only wish I could exclude some of the colours from the random colour option.

author: Billy Chan
comment: Card size is a bit big covering part of the time, but apart from that the face is good. Simple but eye catching, and functional.

author: Ryan Vargas
comment: Perfect but just need black or dark grey colour almost black
title: Good Face

author: John Palad
comment: Only thing is that the 12 hour time (am/pm indication) is wrong. Please fix!
title: Great Watch Face

author: Owoteva Rob
comment: Wouldn't mind proper colour control rather than leaving it purely to chance
title: Unique

author: Piotr Chodań
comment: I feel like it deserves 5 stars simply because of elegance and simplicity. Nice work.
title: Really nice

author: thorsten garbe
comment: One tip. Would be nice to set size for time
title: Looks nice for free

author: Wei Reng Mai
comment: Incorrect 12hr time shown, it is displaying am rather than pm when switching from 24hr clock.

reply.author: MOKAAL P.C.
reply.content:
Thanks for trying out Simple Watch. 
This issue should be fixed in the latest version.

title: Incorrect 12hr clock

author: dave hagen
comment: Killed my battery in less than 6hrs

reply.author: MOKAAL P.C.
reply.content:
Thanks for trying out Simple Watch.

Sadly battery drainage is expected when using the 'continuous' second hand animation. We have 'ticking' seconds as default in the latest version. You can select the seconds hand animation option under "Battery Saver".

title: Killed battery

author: Vala Zadeh
comment: No option to make text bigger

author: Rilic The Wolf
comment: No. No. No. No. No. No.
title: Just... No.

author: Nick Ver Voort
comment: It looks great but I had issues on my 1st gen Moto 360. Every time I woke the watch the color would flicker and eventually go black with just the numbers visible. Viewing a notification card and scrolling back would fix it, but that's not acceptable behavior really
title: Gorgeous but glitchy

author: Danny Wood
comment: If the time display was much larger, I'd keep it. For now I have to uninstall.
title: Not great for my use
